title: Records of county finance director
context: §286-45 Records of county finance director. The director of finance shall file each application received and register the vehicle therein described in a record or book to be kept by the director of finance under the following headings: (1) Vehicle registration number; (2) Name of owner; and (3) Vehicle identification number. The director of finance may microfilm vehicle registration and ownership records which are a year old and may discard the original records. The director of finance may discard vehicle registration and ownership records which are older than six years. [L 1929, c 197, §§4, 5; RL 1935, §2668; RL 1945, §7339; RL 1955, §160-5; am L 1959, c 87, §1; am L 1967, c 61, §1; HRS §286-45; am L l969, c 268, §1; am L 1970, c 73, §1(b); gen ch 1985; am L 1998, c 234, §§2, 29; am L 1999, c 263, §2; am L 2000, c 240, §§2, 21; am L 2001, c 55, §12; am L 2002, c 58, §2]
